author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss massive security flaws in Flock Safety’s nationwide license-plate camera network, highlighting easy device takeover, exposed credentials, and even RF leakage that reveals live video feeds. They dive into how researchers demonstrated full control of the surveillance ecosystem and the dystopian implications.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vzgimftolys

title: These Are MASSIVE Security Flaws

Linus and Luke discuss Microsoft cracking down on KMS38 activation workarounds while Windows updates accidentally break legitimate installs. They explore where AI helpers might actually be useful, why OS-level agents are risky, and how fully local, privacy-preserving voice-automation would be far more appealing.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vzgimftolys

title: Please Stop, Microsoft...

Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss Microsoft’s appeal of a UK ruling that could let consumers legally resell software licenses, exploring how this could upend Windows, Office, and even digital game ownership. They dive into the massive implications for Steam, consoles, rentals, subscriptions, and the entire gaming industry if license resale becomes legally protected.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vzgimftolys

title: This Could Change Everything

author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss the recent Cloudflare outage that rippled across the internet, highlighting how deeply the web depends on a few giant infrastructure providers. They debate why decentralization isn’t realistic today, how DDoS scale has exploded, and why companies stick with AWS/Azure/Cloudflare even when failures take down huge parts of the internet.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vzgimftolys
